welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Louveira, the charming city known for its rich history, warm hospitality, and beautiful scenery. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

airports.airport_name: Comte. Rolim Adolfo Amaro State Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Comte. Rolim Adolfo Amaro State Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Comte. Rolim Adolfo Amaro State Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
